data.name: ShapeNotEntityError
data.value: Shape does not refer to an Entity.

data.name: ShapeNotGroupError
data.value: Shape does not refer to a Group.

data.name: DiagramNoModelError
data.value: Diagram is not associated to a Model.

data.name: CapecDefaultUrl
data.value: http://capec.mitre.org/data/xml/capec_v2.10.xml

data.name: CweDefaultUrl
data.value: http://cwe.mitre.org/data/xml/cwec_v2.10.xml.zip

data.name: MissingParameterError
data.value: Parameter '{0}' is missing.

data.name: UnsupportedFileTypeError
data.value: File '{0}' has an unsupported type.

data.name: CapecPropertySchemaDescription
data.value: Property Schema that collects the properties returned by Capec and applies to Threat Types and Events.

data.name: DefaultNamespace
data.value: https://www.simoneonsecurity.com/tm/2018

data.name: ThreatsPropertySchemaDescription
data.value: Property Schema that collects additional generic properties for Threat Types and Events.

data.name: GraphDeletionConfirmation
data.value: You are about to delete {0} objects. Do you confirm?

data.name: GraphDeletionCaption
data.value: Deleting objects

data.name: CapecConfigPropertySchemaDescription
data.value: Property Schema that collects properties to configure Capec. It is dynamically generated based on the selected properties from Capec data source.

data.name: RemoveIdentityFromModel
data.value: You are about to remove '{0}' from the Threat Model. Are you sure?

data.name: DeleteFromModel
data.value: Delete from Model

data.name: ParentAlignmentWarning
data.value: Parent is not aligned. Please move the shape to the correct parent.

data.name: PropertyHiddenProperties
data.value: List of hidden properties, not to be created in the Capec Property Schema.

data.name: ThreatModelConfigPropertySchemaDescription
data.value: Property Schema that collects properties used to configure the standard Extensions within the Threat Model.

data.name: PropertyHorizontalSpacing
data.value: Horizontal spacing to use for the Diagram automatic layout function.

data.name: PropertyVerticalSpacing
data.value: Vertical spacing to use for the Diagram automatic layout function.

data.name: PropertyPoints
data.value: Reference points for the link.

data.name: PropertyExcelSelectedFields
data.value: Selected fields for the Excel reporting Extension.

data.name: ReportingConfigPropertySchemaDescription
data.value: Property Schema that collects properties used to configure the Reporting Extensions.

data.name: PropertyWordDocumentPath
data.value: Path name of the file used as seed for Word Report generation.

data.name: PropertyWordSections
data.value: Configuration of the Sections for Word Report generation.

data.name: WordPropertySchemaDescription
data.value: Property Schema that collects properties required for the Word Reporting feature.

data.name: PropertyColumnWidths
data.value: Widths of the Columns. It applies to Word Reporting.

data.name: PropertyIgnoredListFields
data.value: Fields to be ignored for the Lists. It applies to Word Reporting.

data.name: AssociatedDiagram
data.value: Identifier of the Diagram associated to the Entity.

data.name: AssociatedDiagramPropertySchemaDescription
data.value: Property Schema that collects properties to manage Diagrams associated to Entities.

data.name: AssociatedEntity
data.value: Identifier of the Entity associated to the Diagram.

data.name: AssociatedEntityPropertySchemaDescription
data.value: Property Schema that collects properties to manage Entities associated to Diagrams.

data.name: MessagePromote
data.value:
You are requesting to get full edit access to the Property Schemas. Please note that editing System Property Schemas is a risky action and is not supported: you may cause your Threat Model to become unreadable. It is recommended to create backup of the Threat Model before proceeding further.
Are you sure you want still to get full access rights?

data.name: EffortPropertySchemaDescription
data.value: Property Schema to represent the Effort required to implement mitigations.

data.name: PropertyEffort
data.value: Estimated effort for implementing the Mitigation.

data.name: DiagramPropertySchemaDescription
data.value: Property Schema that collects properties to be assigned to the Diagrams.

data.name: LinksPropertySchemaDescription
data.value: Property Schema that collects properties to be assigned to the Links within Diagrams.

data.name: PropertyDpiFactor
data.value: Reference Dpi factor for the Diagram.

data.name: MessagePromoteSeverities
data.value:
You are requesting to get full edit access to Severities. Please note that removing Severities is a risky action and is not supported: you may even compromise your Threat Model's integrity. It is recommended to create backup of the Threat Model before proceeding further.
Are you sure you want still to get full access rights?

data.name: PropertyKeywords
data.value: Keywords associated to the Threat Type or Event. This is used to improve the results while Searching for Threats.

data.name: PropertyTemplates
data.value: Templates

data.name: PropertyTemplatesDescription
data.value: Templates used to generate Word Reports for the Threat Model.

data.name: Alernatives
data.value: IDs of the Mitigations that are known alternatives to the current one.

data.name: Complementary
data.value: IDs of the Mitigations that are complementary to the current one.

data.name: RelationshipSchemaDescription
data.value: Property Schema that collects all the Mitigations in relationship with the current Mitigation.
